content.title: Collagen-Based Vascular Closure Devices
content.description: Devices that use collagen plugs to achieve hemostasis by promoting thrombus formation at the arteriotomy site.
content.mechanism: Deploys bioabsorbable collagen sponge/plug against arterial wall; promotes platelet aggregation and thrombus

Mynx.mechanism: PEG sealant injected into tissue tract

advantages: Lower failure rate than suture-based in some studies
limitations: Cannot use at same site for 90 days (AngioSeal)
